Package it.polimi.ingsw.notifications

Class NotificationCenter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.notifications.NotificationCenter
public class NotificationCenter extends Object
A notification dispatch mechanism that enables the broadcast of information to registered observers.

  • Method Details

    • shared

      public static NotificationCenter shared()
      Gets the common instance of NotificationCenter with the Singleton pattern
      Returns:
      (type NotificationCenter) the shared instance of NotificationCenter

    • addObserver

      public void addObserver(Object observer, NotificationCallback callback, NotificationName name, Object observedObject)
      Creates and adds the Observer
      Parameters:
      observer - (type Object) a new notification observer
      callback - (type NotificationCallback) The NotificationCallback of the observer, which will be invoked when the notification is posted
      name - (type NotificationName) The name of the notification linked to this callback
      observedObject - (type Object) If null, the observer receives all notifications with the same name posted with any value of observed object. If specified, the callback will be invoked only if the ObservedObject parameter of the post method matches this value

    • removeObserver

      public void removeObserver(Object observer)
      Removes and deletes the Observer from the notification queue
      Parameters:
      observer - (type Object) Observer to delete

    • post

      public void post(NotificationName name, Object observedObject, HashMap<String,Object> userInfo)
      Posts a Notification
      Parameters:
      name - (type NotificationName) The name of the notification to post
      observedObject - (type Object) The object with which observers must have registered their notifications in order to receive them
      userInfo - (type HashMap(String, Object) The optional data posted with the Notification
